mapper.insert: INSERT INTO question_tb ( question_type, question_title, question_content, question_date, user_id ) VALUES ( #{question_type}, #{question_title}, #{question_content}, now(), "2" )
mapper.select: SELECT q.question_id, q.question_type, q.question_title, q.question_content, q.question_answer, q.question_date, q.user_id, u.email FROM question_tb q JOIN userentity u ON q.user_id = u.id WHERE q.user_id = "2" ORDER BY q.question_date DESC
select uuid ,uploadPath ,fileName, image, question_id from question_attach where question_id=#{question_id}
